trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZC002_03385_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The sentry captain fears for the fate of one of his men.
TEXT_LUCKZC002_03385_TODO_00<tab>Search for the amaro.
TEXT_LUCKZC002_03385_TODO_01<tab>Search for the amaro once again.
TEXT_LUCKZC002_03385_TODO_02<tab>Use the healing salve on the wounded sentry.
TEXT_LUCKZC002_03385_TODO_03<tab>Report back to the sentry captain.

TEXT_LUCKZC002_03385_SCOUTCHIEF03385_000_000<tab>Damn it all! We can ill afford to lose another─ Ho there, friend. Might you lend me your aid? One of my best men has yet to return from his patrol, and I fear the worst.

TEXT_LUCKZC002_03385_SCOUTCHIEF03385_000_001<tab>As you can see, his amaro made it back safely, but my man's nowhere to be found. Could you search for him in my stead? I would go myself, but I can't very well abandon my post.
TEXT_LUCKZC002_03385_SCOUTAMARO03385_000_002<tab>(-Amaro-)Gwee, gwee!
TEXT_LUCKZC002_03385_SCOUTCHIEF03385_000_003<tab>Bloody beast! Where do you think you're─ Ah, too late I suppose. But wait... Do you reckon he's gone back for his rider?
TEXT_LUCKZC002_03385_SCOUTCHIEF03385_000_004<tab>Sorry to trouble you, friend, but do you think you could follow that amaro for us? That scaly brute might be my best chance at finding our man.
TEXT_LUCKZC002_03385_SCOUTCHIEF03385_000_005<tab>And take this salve with you. I reckon there's a good chance he's out there, too wounded to have made his way back.
TEXT_LUCKZC002_03385_SCOUTCHIEF03385_000_010<tab>Pray follow that amaro, friend! That beast might be our best hope to track down my missing man.
TEXT_LUCKZC002_03385_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>The amaro stares intently in the general direction of Dampsole.
TEXT_LUCKZC002_03385_SCOUTAMARO03385_000_021<tab>Gwee? Gweeeeee!
TEXT_LUCKZC002_03385_SCOUTPRIVATE03385_000_030<tab>Gah! Damned fiend got me in the leg... I can barely stand, let alone move. Is this the end for me?
TEXT_LUCKZC002_03385_SYSTEM_000_040<tab>The amaro eyes the wounded soldier with a gaze that could almost be described as concerned. This must be the sentry who was separated from his mount.
TEXT_LUCKZC002_03385_SCOUTAMARO03385_000_041<tab>Gweeeeee! Gweeeeee!
TEXT_LUCKZC002_03385_SYSTEM_000_042<tab>The amaro eyes you with an expectant gaze. You sense it is hoping that you will tend to the man's wounds.
TEXT_LUCKZC002_03385_SCOUTAMARO03385_000_050<tab>Gweeeeee! Gweeeeee!
TEXT_LUCKZC002_03385_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>The amaro eyes you with an expectant gaze. You sense it is hoping that you will tend to the man's wounds.
TEXT_LUCKZC002_03385_SCOUTPRIVATE03385_000_060<tab>Thank you, friend! When the beast knocked me from my mount, I thought it was the end of me for sure! But however did you know where to look?
TEXT_LUCKZC002_03385_SCOUTPRIVATE03385_000_061<tab>My mount led you to me? You don't say!

TEXT_LUCKZC002_03385_SCOUTPRIVATE03385_000_062<tab>I owe you an apology, little fellow... Here I thought you ran off in fear of my foe, but it turns out you were looking for help the whole time. Can you forgive me for doubting you?
TEXT_LUCKZC002_03385_SCOUTAMARO03385_000_063<tab>Gwee!
TEXT_LUCKZC002_03385_SCOUTPRIVATE03385_000_064<tab>And with that, I'd best head back to the Imperative and let everyone know I'm all right. Thank you, my friend. You saved my life today.

TEXT_LUCKZC002_03385_SCOUTCHIEF03385_000_070<tab>Ah, there you are. I was hoping that you'd return so I could properly express my gratitude. You'll be happy to know─as I would─that my man has safely returned to the Imperative.

TEXT_LUCKZC002_03385_SCOUTCHIEF03385_000_071<tab>Those amaro can be stubborn brutes at times, but times like this make a man appreciate what loyal companions they truly are. I'd say this one's earned himself some extra feed for dinner today!
